name: Frog Life (Mopi)
description:
Run, hop, and swim your way to victory in this charming pico-8 remake of Duck Life!

The game focuses around training your frog through mini-games to win races

This remake fixes one of the most startling issues with the original game, the blatant lack of frogs. Now, with 16 hats and 7 colors to choose from, you can customize your frog to your hearts desire!

How To Play

  • Races are automatic and are based off of your frog's stats. If you aren't winning, it means you need to train more!
  • If your frog is fainting in the middle of a race, it means they're low on energy and need to be fed more to increase their energy stat
  • Any more questions? Make sure to post it in the comments, and I'll make sure to address the issues asap
  • Z = Circle Button
  • X = X button
  • Arrow Keys for all other inputs

Train your frog via games to win races, and earn enough prize money to buy every hat!
